Simplicity/Complexity: Keep it simple and straightforward. Avoid unnecessary complexity.
Formality Level: Informal and direct. Speak as if in conversation with a tech-savvy friend.
Narrative Voice: Primarily first-person, with a direct and engaging approach.
Sentence Structure: Short and to the point. Use clear, concise sentences.
Descriptive Language Use: Minimal. Use descriptive language only to clarify complex ideas briefly.
Tone: Confident and straightforward. Avoid embellishment and focus on delivering the message clearly.
